plugins.name: Sitemap
plugins.description:
Create maps of your site. Crawl links. Recursive & fast.


________


üåê How does it work ?


‚Ä¢ type/paste your site url

‚Ä¢ click on "Create Map"

‚Ä¢ a Sitemap is displayed on your main canvas, listing all links found in the html source of


‚Ä¢ for further exploration : select a group with a link, and click on "Create map" again. A new map is then created, with all the links found in this new page.

‚Ä¢ Links that are found on both pages are shown with a reduced opacity, so you can easily spot "new" links, that are present only on the sub page.


________


üß∞ Options


‚Ä¢ you can sort urls alphabetically or by url length

‚Ä¢ you can choose to only display links that contain a specific word/url (using "Contains..")

‚Ä¢ .. or you can exclude links based on a word/url (using "Without..")

‚Ä¢ you can also search for specific word/url (by selecting one or multiple frames, typing the word then click "search")

‚Ä¢ not necessary, but I suggest you choose an empty page, with a background color set to #3C6DD3, when you use this plugin


________


üì∏ Screenshots (option)


‚Ä¢ you can automatically display screenshots of the given urls

‚Ä¢ to do so, this plugin uses free api API Flash

‚Ä¢ please note that I am not affiliated with API Flash


In order to use the screenshot option, you will need to get a free account on https://apiflash.com/ (free up to 100 screenshots per month). Then, just paste your API key inside the right input, then select "With screenshots"


________


üóíÔ∏è Notes


This plugin is a WIP. Besides, it may not be as efficient as dedicated SEO tools, but can be useful (I hope!) to get a quick view of how your site is organised. If you find bugs, or if you find this plugin usefull and have suggestions on how to improve it, please feel free to contact me.


NB : this plugin uses cors-anywhere.herokuapp.com, which can sometimes affect its responsiveness.

plugins.name: Contento
plugins.description:
Features


Magic Fill

A feature to apply data in objects.


Folders

A way to organize contents and fuels up Magic Fill.


Discover

"Discover" is the place to discover more contents, having a lot of PNG (transparent background) image stocks, previewing and playing around with format options and very easily duplicating them into your own collections.


Apply Content for Sublayers

Many times when applying data, selecting multiple list elements individually will become very cumbersome. In Contento, you only need to select the parent layer, and apply different contents to sublayers that have different names.


Unsplash Photos

You can choose photos from Unsplash to create image library. You can also provide any external image urls.


Content Types & Settings

Any Image Library provides settings:

  • Pixel: "auto" by default, which automatically chooses pixels according to the width & height of each layer individually. Note: this feature is only for Unsplash image urls.
  • Order: random / ascending

Any Number Library provides settings:

  • Min value
  • Max value
  • Prefix
  • Suffix
  • Decimal number
  • Thousand separators
  • Order

Any Date & time Library provides settings:

  • Date format
  • Time format
  • Time range
  • Order

Any Serial number Library provides settings:

  • Start value
  • Interval value
  • Places
  • Prefix
  • Suffix

Any Text Library provides settings:

  • Order
  • Prefix
  • Suffix


Custom Libraries

You can create custom content libraries with types like text, image, number, date & time and serial number.
plugins.tagline: Content applier you love.

85659.release_notes:
New features:

1. Folders: Contento now supports a new type a content - folders. Apparently you can put sub-content inside a folder, but the real power is you can apply "Magic Fill" in the scope of a folder.

2. Bulk actions: you can now "Delete" or "Move to folder" in bulk.

3. Apply content in editor: sometimes we want to apply some data temporarily but not want to save them to our content list. For this kind of situations, Contento now supports applying data directly in the editor. (Also support shortcut: holding command key and the main call to action will turn to "Apply")

4. Continuous creation: now you can hold alt key in content editor and click "Create and Continue", then you can stay in the editor and start creating the next content.

plugins.name: Appearance
plugins.description:
This plugin generates a dark/light theme from your selection.

The plugin works with external library styles and local styles.

You can choose styles name identification in settings. By default, the plugin use [day] for light and [night] for dark.


ü§ì How it works:

1. Use [day] and [night] in your style names. Example: Style name[day]/ Style name[night].

2. Apply your color styles.

3. Select any object, then choose Appearance ‚Üí Dark mode or Appearance ‚Üí Light mode.


üìî How it works with external library styles:

1. Open external library file and use [day] and [night] in color style names. Example: Style name[day]/ Style name[night].

2. Publish changes.

3. Select Appearance ‚Üí Save styles for saving external color styles to the plugin.

4. Open any file linked to the library.

5. Apply color styles.

6. Select any object then choose Appearance ‚Üí Dark mode or Appearance ‚Üí Light mode


---


‚úèÔ∏è Name examples:

You can use [day] / [night] at any place of your style names.




Color name [day]

Color name [night]




Style [day] / color-name

Style [night] / color-name




Style / color-name [day]

Style / color-name [night]

plugins.name: Colorwell
plugins.description:
Colorwell is like having a painters mixing palette in Figma. Select your mixing color, and spin the color mixer to mix it in. Then use or save the currently mixed color to your palette or Figma design.


The advanced color mixing algorithm used in Colorwell implements the Kubelka & Munk theory to predict realistic color mixing behavior.


Features


  • Advanced paint-like color mixing algorithm.
  • Color palettes are saved per Figma document.
  • Sample colors in your palette from your Figma document.
  • Mix in or out the currently selected mixing color by rotating the color mixer clockwise or counterclockwise.
  • Build a new palette from an image by dragging an image file onto the Colorwell window.
  • Easily use the currently mixed color by copying its hex value, or having Colorwell apply as a fill or stroke to the currently selected layers in your Figma document.


Colorwell's mixing algorithm is provided by the wonderful team behind Mixbox. Learn more about it from their YouTube Talk.

accepted.name: Dustin Mierau
accepted.description: Cofound and led design at Path. Helped build Napster for macOS. Making Figma plugins that I find useful in my own work and hope you do too. üòä

plugins.tagline: Mix colors like paint in Figma.

plugins.name: Contrast Checker
plugins.description:
Check contrast in your UI design based on Contrast Success Criteria 1.4.3 and 1.4.6 of the Web Content Accessibility Guideline (WCAG).


How it works:

  1. Select colors;
  2. Confirm the colors;
  3. The application will inform you if the contrast is good for normal sized texts and large text (above 18 points);
  4. The reset button clears the interface, but it doesn't need to be pressed for you to recheck.


For informational purposes:

  1. Level A: Bad, ineffective;
  2. Level AA: Good, effective;
  3. Level AAA: Great, excellent.


Created as an object of study.
plugins.tagline: Check contrast in your UI design

plugins.name: Find in page
plugins.description:
This plugin allows you search for layers/text in by a phrase.

You can also:

  1. Multi-select results
  2. Click on a result to navigate to it
  3. Replace the phrase you searched in all locations


If you like it, please like and comment. It will help others to see the value as well :)


Watch demo here.

Support my work here <3


How to use:

  1. Select search scope (Selection / Page / File)
  2. Type a phrase (or multiple phrases separated by comma)
  3. Select if to 'match word'
  4. Select search elements (Layers / Texts)
  5. If 'Layers' selected - Choose layer type
  6. Run the plugin
  7. Click on the result name to zoom on layer
  8. Select all / specific result
  9. Replace the phrase you typed in the layers names / texts with new phrase


Important notes:

  1. Don't search for phrases that will return lots of results. It will take a long time to get them or the plugin will crash.
  2. You can't select all / replace multiple layers when the results contain layers from different pages
plugins.tagline: Find and select elements in your file easily

plugins.name: Gifmock
plugins.description:
Gifmock is a tool that helps you create high-quality GIFs from static images and mockups.


gifmock.com


Here is how it works:

1. Select layers to create GIF frames

2. Adjust the delay and position of your frames with pixel-perfect precision

3. Export


SMART CROPPING

Crop all your frames in a few clicks to highlight a specific part of your design.


PIXEL PREVIEW

Pan and zoom on the canvas to position your frames with pixel precision.


MEASUREMENT

Hold option to show distance from the edge when moving your frame.


RETINA SUPPORT

You can import and export at the resolution you like. 1x, 2x, 3x, you decide.


PER FRAME DELAY

Want to pause on a frame for a few seconds? Set the delay of your choice on any frame.


SECURE

Gifmock stores your GIF data on your machine. None of your content is saved on the cloud.


FRAME ORDERING

New frames are automatically ordered. Re-order them with a simple drag-and-drop.


RELIABLE

Established in 2017, Gifmock has a proven track record of being reliable.

accepted.name: Steven Fabre
accepted.description: Co-founder, Liveblocks

plugins.name: Table Builder
plugins.description:
Table Builder lets you create and update tables by pasting tabular data from your spread sheets.


For each entry in the spread sheet, Table Builder creates an instance of your original cell component, positions it in a grid and updates the cell's first child of type `text` with the data entry from the spreadsheet (Excel, Numbers, etc).


Demo


Video ‚Äì Generate new table

Video ‚Äì Update existing table


Usage


Create a new table


  1. Create a component that contains a text label (make sure the text label's `horizontal resizing` property is set to `Hug` if it uses auto layout)
  2. Select an instance of that component
  3. In the plugins menu, select Table Builder and then Generate new table
  4. Copy tabular data from the spreadsheet and paste it into the text area of the plugin's UI
  5. Click on the Generate table button


Update an existing table


  1. Select a table that was created with Table Builder
  2. In the plugins menu, select Table Builder and then Update existing table
  3. Copy tabular data from the spreadsheet and paste it into the text area of the plugin's UI
  4. Click on the Update table button
plugins.tagline: Create tables ... super fast

plugins.name: ChartGen (Beta)
plugins.description:
ChartGen quickly generates real looking chart lines for designs without having to have the real data. ChartGen simulates high quality trending data, so the end result closely matches performance, analytics, and financial price charts. Every chart generated is celebrated and is given a unique name.

plugins.name: Tailwind Color Palettes - TailwindCSS Import & Export
plugins.description:
This plugin will add Tailwind Color Styles to your Figma file. You can choose between the available presets.


Features:

  1. You can select the following presets from the dropdown - Tailwind v4, Tailwind v3, Tailwind v2, Tailwind v1 and Tailwind UI (deprecated)
  2. In addition you can generate a custom file using the tailwind.config.js file content using this file generator
  3. You can import the palette that you've create tailwind.ink using the generator and custom file upload feature
  4. Export the local color styles as CSS/JSON with RGB/HSL/OKLCH support.


Note:

There could be minute differences in the color values. For example oklch(0.637 0.237 25.331) becomes oklch(63.79% 0.2373 25.44deg) in the plugin. This happens due to the conversion from tailwind color to Figma color and Figma color to tailwind config color in the "export" feature.

So the values are slightly off in the "export" feature. I will try to improve it.


If you enjoy this plugin, please follow me on twitter.


Thanks!

Single and Batch Editor

If you only need the reverse command, you can also use RTL PLZ Reverse plugin.

plugins.name: Vimeo Record
plugins.description:
Bring excitement back to virtual collaboration with video messaging


The Vimeo Record plugin allows you to record your screen, webcam, or both directly from the files you‚Äôre collaborating on in Figma and FigJam. This means that you can spend less time typing out your feedback, and more time capturing ideas right as inspiration strikes.


To leave live feedback in FigJam, simply record your comments in the file of choice, then watch your video preview unfurl alongside your work. When working on a project in Figma Design, you can embed your video as a thumbnail directly on the Figma canvas. Your collaborators can then watch your comments, ideas, or accolades via simple playback within your whiteboard or canvas.


Here‚Äôs how your team can use Vimeo Record to work better together:


  • Project onboarding: Record a short welcome video to review goals, progress, and next steps so new team members can get up to speed quickly without the need for another meeting or lengthy email.
  • Design feedback: Highlight specific visual elements while narrating your feedback to keep your ideas in context.
  • Async ideation: Share your ideas at the moment inspiration strikes to add more engaging context to your projects -- then let your team watch and respond with comments when it‚Äôs convenient for them.


How to get started:

  1. Download the Vimeo Record plugin
  2. Connect Vimeo to your Figma account
  3. Select recording modes
  4. Create your video
  5. Add video to canvas or share link to it with your team
  6. Check this How-to article for more details
  7. Install Vimeo Record Chrome Extension to record videos wherever you go
plugins.tagline: Record and share unlimited free video messages.

plugins.name: Figment.so - Figma to Website
plugins.description:
Turn your Figma design into a website without a single line of code.


The Figment process:

  1. Design website
  2. Run Figment plugin
  3. Publish website
  4. Drink coffee


When you run it, the Figment plugin will do a bunch of translations under the hood to convert the design over to a website, for a modestly-sized website this process can take up to 10 seconds - so please be patient!


Once it finishes, you will be asked whether this design is meant for Mobile or Desktop screens (don't worry, you can export both into the same website). Finally, after selecting a screen type, your website design will be hosted on our editor so that you can make some final changes to it, such as adding links, textfields, videos, etc.


Give it a try now and host your first website completely free!


Need support?

DM us on Twitter:

@useFigment


Built with ‚ù§Ô∏è by @nikita_builds and @tknndy

plugins.name: Android Resources Export
plugins.description:
Export png, nine-patch, adaptive icon in Android folder structure (drawable-xhdpi, etc..).


TIPS


- Run "New PNG" will add slice layers for every selected layers. You can aslo add slice layer by yourself, or add a export to layer.


- You must use "New Nine-Patch" to create a nine-patch asset, or duplicate a nine-patch asset then change the content.


- Before running "Export PNG" or "Export Nine-Patch", you can select some assets, they will be listed on plugin UI. And if have no selected layer in page, it will list all assets in document.


- You can use the "Export PNG" or "Export Nine-Patch" plugin button on the inspector panel to export assets.


- Click the preview image of asset on plugin UI, you can show the layer center in canvas.


- If you change the layer or asset name when plugin running, you need to run plugin again (cmd+alt+p) to apply the change.


- Run "New App Icon" will create icon template in a new page, you can create multiple icons. Select the app icon page, hide all icon grid layer then run "Export App Icon" to export it.

plugins.name: Timer
plugins.description:
Use text to create a timer on a Figma page.

There are two ways to start a timer:

1. Type the time you want to count down in Timer: HH:MM:SS format (e.g. Timer: 5:00), then press 'Start'.
2. Type the time you want to count down in HH:MM:SS format (e.g. 5:00). In this case you need to select the text layer before pressing 'Start'

Additionally, you can now start a couple of timers on a page (for whatever reason).

Checkout Timebox ‚è± for a collection of Timers that work great with this plugin: https://www.figma.com/community/file/824677652393376493.

plugins.name: RemixIcon
plugins.description:
RemixIcon Official Plugin. 




Remix Icon is a set of open-source neutral-style system symbols for designers and developers. 


Unlike a patchwork icon library, 3000+ icons are all elaborately crafted so that they are born with the gene of readability, consistency and perfect pixels.

plugins.name: GitHub
plugins.description:
Note: This plugin does not work with self-hosted GitHub instances (GitHub Enterprise Server or "GHES")


Connect design to code with the GitHub plugin for Dev Mode. With this plugin you can link GitHub files, issues, and pull requests to Figma component and designs, so you always have the context you need in one place.


Use the plugin to‚Ä¶

  • Link components in GitHub to components in Figma, so that when developers are implementing designs they know whether a component already exists in the codebase and which one to use.
  • Link GitHub issues to Figma designs, so developers have all of the context needed to implement a design.
  • Link GitHub pull requests to Figma designs, so that teammates can track implementation of a design.
  • View linked GitHub files, issues, and pull requests in Figma for quick previews without context switching.


Learn more about Dev Mode here. (https://help.figma.com/hc/en-us/articles/15023124644247)

plugins.name: Copy & Rotate
plugins.description:
üîÑ‚ú® Create radial interfaces and patterns with rotated copies of elements.


Copy & Rotate harnesses the power of Figma components and creates instantiated copies can be modified after being created by the plugin.


In addition to changing the number of copies and radius of the rotation, individual copies can be skipped and the sweep angle can be adjusted.


‚ö†Ô∏è Caveats

  • If you want to copy & rotate multiple elements, group them first. Only one element must be selected.
  • It's not possible to rotate groups that contain component nodes. Remove the component or componentize the entire group first.
  • It's not possible to rotate elements that are children of components or instances. Select the parent instance or component element instead.


‚ùå Node types that are not supported

  • Document nodes
  • Page nodes
  • Slice nods

plugins.name: QR Code Designer
plugins.description:
QR Code Designer is the missing QR code customization tool. Create custom QR codes that match your brand and design guidelines. This tool integrates with Figma seamlessly by leaving complex QR code generation to the plugin, while allowing you to customize the colors, logo, and effects using regular old Figma.


Features

  • Multiple shapes: Choose from multiple different QR code line shapes, including classic, dotted, and curved. More shapes and custom templates coming soon!
  • Logo friendly: Optionally cut out the center of the QR code to place your own logo or icon.
  • Live preview: View a live preview of the QR code before placing it on the page
  • Scan testing: Automatically test the scannability your QR code to ensure that it is still readable after your customizations
  • Editable: Edit an existing QR code, even after you have applied custom colours and effects in Figma


Coming up

The most exciting feature is still to come! Soon you will be able to design your own QR code line shapes using custom templates.
plugins.tagline: Create QR codes that match your design guidelines
